DOC.detailed_description: This Randomized , double-blinded , placebo-controlled trial involve 33 subject . Subjects randomize one follow three group . Group N Product 1 . 10 BIgG anti-CFA/I 2 . 10 BIgG anti-CfaE 3 . 10 LactoFree® Lipil® Volunteers receive test article three time daily follow meal begin 2 day prior oral ETEC challenge ( strain H10407 ) . Test article administer total 7 day . Monitoring procedure assess volunteer safety , primary endpoint ( diarrhea ) , stool microbiology ( H10407 excretion ) , ETEC-specific immunology . All volunteer receive antibiotic treatment ( ciprofloxacin , trimethoprim-sulfamethoxazole amoxicillin ) start 5 day ETEC challenge sooner base pre-defined clinical criterion . Follow-up visit 2 week post-discharge monitor safety immunological parameter .
